00020 // IArray
00022 
00024 
00025 template<class T>
00026 class IArray
00027 {
00028 public:
00029         virtual size_t size() const = 0;
00030         virtual T& operator[](size_t i) = 0;
00031         virtual const T& operator[](size_t i) const = 0;
00032 
00033 protected:
00034         IArray() { }
00035         virtual ~IArray() { }
00036 
00037 private:
00038         IArray(const IArray& other);
00039         IArray& operator=(const IArray& rhs);
00040 };
00041 
00043 
00045 
00046 template<class T>
00047 class ArrayImplWrapper : public IArray<T>
00048 {
00049 public:
00050 
00051         ArrayImplWrapper(T* data, size_t size)
00052                 : m_data(data)
00053                 , m_size(size)
00054         {
00055                 ASSERT_STRICT(data);
00056                 ASSERT_STRICT(size);
00057         }
00058 
00059         virtual size_t size() const 
00060         { 
00061                 return m_size; 
00062         }
00063 
00064         virtual T& operator[](size_t i) 
00065         { 
00066                 ASSERT_STRICT(i < m_size);
00067                 return m_data[i];
00068         }
00069 
00070         virtual const T& operator[](size_t i) const
00071         { 
00072                 ASSERT_STRICT(i < m_size);
00073                 return m_data[i];
00074         }
00075 
00076 private:
00077         T* m_data;
00078         size_t m_size;
00079 };
00080 
00082 
00084 
00085 template<class T, int S>
00086 class ArrayImplOwned : public ArrayImplWrapper<T>
00087 {
00088 public:
00089 
00090         ArrayImplOwned()
00091                 : ArrayImplWrapper<T>(m_data, S)
00092         { }
00093 
00094 private:
00095         T m_data[S];
00096 };

00103 // IDynArray
00105 
00107 
00108 template<class T>
00109 class IDynArray : public IArray<T>
00110 {
00111 public:
00112         virtual size_t capacity() const = 0;
00113         virtual void reserve(size_t size) = 0;
00114         virtual void resize(size_t size) = 0;
00115         virtual void push_back(const T& value) = 0;
00116         virtual void clear() = 0;
00117 };
00118 
00120 
00121 template<class T, class C = std::vector<T> >
00122 class DynArrayImplWrapper : public IDynArray<T>
00123 {
00124 public:
00125         DynArrayImplWrapper(C* container)
00126                 : m_container(container)
00127         { }
00128 
00129         virtual size_t size() const
00130         {
00131                 return m_container->size();
00132         }
00133 
00134         virtual T& operator[](size_t i)
00135         {
00136                 return (*m_container)[i];
00137         }
00138 
00139         virtual const T& operator[](size_t i) const
00140         {
00141                 return (*m_container)[i];
00142         }
00143 
00144         virtual size_t capacity() const
00145         {
00146                 return m_container->capacity();
00147         }
00148 
00149         virtual void reserve(size_t size)
00150         {
00151                 m_container->reserve(size);
00152         }
00153 
00154         virtual void resize(size_t size)
00155         {
00156                 m_container->resize(size);
00157         }
00158 
00159         virtual void push_back(const T& value)
00160         {
00161                 m_container->push_back(value);
00162         }
00163 
00164         virtual void clear()
00165         {
00166                 m_container->clear();
00167         }
00168 
00169 private:
00170         C* m_container;
00171 };

00175 template<class T, class C = std::vector<T> >
00176 class DynArrayImplOwned : public DynArrayImplWrapper<T, C>
00177 {
00178 public:
00179         DynArrayImplOwned()
00180                 : DynArrayImplWrapper<T, C>(&m_container)
00181         { }
00182

00184         C m_container;

00192 // IMap
00194 
00195 template<class Key, class Val>
00196 class IMap
00197 {
00198 public:
00199         virtual size_t size() const = 0;
00200         virtual Val& operator[](const Key& key) = 0;
00201         virtual const Val& operator[](const Key& key) const = 0;
00202 };
00203 
00205 
00206 template<class Key, class Val, class C = std::map<Key, Val> >
00207 class MapImplWrapper : public IMap<Key, Val>
00208 {
00209 public:
00210         MapImplWrapper(C* container)
00211                 : m_container(container)
00212         { }
00213 
00214         virtual size_t size() const
00215         {
00216                 return m_container->size();
00217         }
00218 
00219         virtual Val& operator[](const Key& key)
00220         {
00221                 return (*m_container)[key];
00222         }
00223 
00224         virtual const Val& operator[](const Key& key) const
00225         {
00226                 return (*m_container)[key];
00227         }
00228 
00229 private:
00230         C* m_container;
00231 };
